A higher-vibrational “Earth phantom” was created, into which the Sphere of Amenti could be released during an appropriate time cycle. Once the Sphere was returned to the Earth Phantom energy imprint, the higher 3-dimensional aspects of the race awareness would be released from the D-4 Seal of Palaidor, and would be able to enter their race Cloister after death, so part of the soul essence could return to Sphere of Amenti to await the release of the fifth-dimensional Seal of Amenti.
